_comment: ✏️ EDIT THIS FILE TO UPDATE YOUR CHINA WEBSITE - No coding needed!
_instructions: Edit any text below. Save file. Run 'npm run build'. Upload dist/ folder.

tagline.zh: 您通往巴西市场的桥梁
tagline.en: Your Bridge to the Brazilian Market

meta.description: Connecting established Chinese companies with opportunities in Brazil
meta.keywords: China, Brazil, B2B, import, export, BRICS, Canton Fair

title.zh: 不要错过2026年中国和巴西之间最大的商业项目
title.en: Don't miss the biggest business project in Brazil-China relations in 2026

subtitle.zh: 通过信任、专业知识和战略合作伙伴关系，将中国企业与巴西的机遇联系起来。
subtitle.en: Connecting Chinese companies with opportunities in Brazil through trust, expertise, and strategic partnerships.

canton_banner_text.en: 🎯 Meet us at Canton Fair! Booth 15.2 H19-20

content.zh: 促进中国企业战略性进入巴西市场，建立基于互信和可持续增长的有价值合作伙伴关系。
content.en: Facilitate the strategic entry of Chinese companies into the Brazilian market, creating valuable partnerships based on mutual trust and sustainable growth.

content.zh: 成为中国和巴西之间的主要桥梁，将文化差异转化为商业机会，共建南南贸易的未来。
content.en: To be the leading bridge between China and Brazil, transforming cultural differences into business opportunities and building the future of South-South trade.

content.zh: 我们深刻理解关系的概念。我们不仅做生意——我们建立基于相互尊重、信任和互惠互利的持久关系。
content.en: We deeply understand the concept of Guanxi. We don't just do business - we build lasting relationships based on mutual respect, trust, and reciprocal benefits.

description.zh: 数字平台连接中国供应商与合格的巴西买家。
description.en: Digital platform connecting Chinese suppliers with qualified Brazilian buyers.

description.zh: 识别品牌和产品在巴西市场发展最有前景的地区，并进行市场开发运营。
description.en: Identification of the most promising regions for brand and products development on the Brazilian market, and operation for market development.

description.zh: 通过与合作伙伴的关系管理，为中国公司提供法律和税务方面的全面支持，为巴西客户提供认证和进口方面的支持。
description.en: Complete support for Chinese companies on the legal and tax aspects, and for Brazilian customers on the certification and importation, through management of the relationship with our partners.

description.zh: 商务访问、业务洽谈会和国际展会参与。
description.en: Trade missions, business rounds, and participation in international fairs.

description.zh: 全面核实公司、产品和认证，确保中国公司在巴西的交易安全。
description.en: Complete verification of companies, products, and certifications to ensure safe transactions for Chinese companies in Brazil.

description.zh: 物流、文件、合规和巴西法规的全面咨询。
description.en: Complete advisory on logistics, documentation, compliance, and Brazilian regulations.

description.zh: 了解您为巴西市场的需求、产品和目标。
description.en: We understand your needs, products, and goals for the Brazilian market.

description.zh: 研究和识别与您的目标相匹配的需求、竞争和机会。
description.en: Research and identification of demand, competition, and opportunities that match your goals.

description.zh: 介绍您特定市场的合格买家和经过验证的分销商。
description.en: Introduction of qualified buyers and verified distributors of your specific market.

description.zh: 通过本地市场影响力，我们在巴西市场战略性地发展品牌和产品的存在。
description.en: Through local market influence, we strategically develop brand and products presence in the Brazilian market.

description.zh: 售前和售后跟进、物流和解决文化/商业挑战。
description.en: Pre and post-sale follow-up, logistics, and resolution of cultural/commercial challenges.

section_title.zh: 开始您与China Business Hub的合作
section_title.en: Start Your Partnership with China Business Hub

subtitle.zh: 请填写以下信息，我们将尽快与您联系讨论合作细节！
subtitle.en: Please fill out the information below and we will contact you soon to discuss partnership details!

success_message.zh: ✅ 消息发送成功！我们将在24小时内回复。
success_message.en: ✅ Message sent successfully! We'll respond within 24 hours.

error_message.zh: ❌ 发送错误。请通过WhatsApp或微信联系。
error_message.en: ❌ Error sending. Please try via WhatsApp or WeChat.

error_missing_fields.zh: ❌ 请填写所有必填字段（标有红色星号*）。
error_missing_fields.en: ❌ Please fill in all required fields (marked with red asterisk *).

error_invalid_email.zh: ❌ 电子邮件格式无效。请检查并重试。
error_invalid_email.en: ❌ Invalid email format. Please check and try again.

error_send_failed.zh: ❌ 无法发送消息。请稍后重试或通过WhatsApp/微信联系。
error_send_failed.en: ❌ Failed to send message. Please try again later or contact via WhatsApp/WeChat.

error_spam.zh: ❌ 提交被阻止。如果这是一个错误，请通过WhatsApp或微信联系我们。
error_spam.en: ❌ Submission blocked. If this is an error, please contact us via WhatsApp or WeChat.

copyright.zh: © 2025 China Business Hub. 保留所有权利。
copyright.en: © 2025 China Business Hub. All rights reserved.
